dcterms:creator: J. Bayer
P. Dasgupta
S. Mukhopadhyay
R. Ghosh
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the functional structure of the Bangla discourse particle 'to' and its role in conversational pragmatics.
dcterms:title: Bengali discourse particle 'to'

dcterms:creator: S. Karmakar
S. Ghosh
A. Banerjee
dcterms:description: This manuscript presents a syntactic framework for the conversational pragmatics of Bengali, focusing on the role of the Bangla particle 'to' in conversational analysis.
dcterms:title: Conversational Pragmatics of Bengali

dcterms:creator: J. Austin
dcterms:description: This foundational work discusses speech acts and their role in conversational analysis, providing a theoretical framework for understanding illocutionary acts.
dcterms:title: Speech Acts

dcterms:creator: L. Rizzi
dcterms:description: This work focuses on the fine structure of the left periphery in syntax, providing insights into the role of discourse particles in sentence structure.
dcterms:title: The fine structure of the left periphery

dcterms:creator: J. Searle
dcterms:description: This foundational work discusses speech acts and their classification, providing a framework for understanding illocutionary acts in conversational contexts.
dcterms:title: Speech Acts

dcterms:creator: D. Vanderveken
dcterms:description: This work focuses on meaning and speech acts, providing insights into the role of illocutionary acts in conversational contexts.
dcterms:title: Meaning and Speech Acts
